Section_2.title: Get to know crezco
Section_2.description: Crezco provides resources that create growth opportunities for at-risk Honduran youth to address and improve negative family patterns for the next generation.

Paragraphs.Title: HOW CAN YOU HELP?
Paragraphs.Pray_1: Pray with us for Crezco's ministry: our programs, program participants, the communities we work in, and our volunteers.
Paragraphs.Pray_2: Sign up for our annual newsletter with program updates and prayer requests.

Administrative.Title: ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT
Administrative.Subtitle: Crezco needs volunteers in a variety of areas including accounting, secretary work, and travel management.

Domain_Camp.Title: DONATION CAMPAIGNS
Domain_Camp.Subtitle: Support our donation campaigns & special projects. Spread the word to other potential sponsors and donors. Get your church, school, or small group involved! Campaigns are both in-kind and monetary.

University_Page.Abreviation-desktop: Higher educational opportunities hold the key to breaking negative generational cycles. By providing students  educational opportunities, we...
University_Page.Abreviation-mobile: Higher educational opportunities hold the key to breaking negative...
University_Page.Paragraph_1: Higher educational opportunities hold the key to breaking negative generational cycles.
University_Page.Paragraph_2: By providing students in Crezco's University Sponsorship Program with access to higher educational opportunities, we empower them to transcend the limitations of their past and current circumstances. These students are not only preparing for personal success but also gaining knowledge, skills, and confidence, to positively impact their future families and communities.

subject_1.title: EMOTIONAL HEALTH
subject_1.description: Academic success is just one aspect of a student's growth. Emotional well-being is equally crucial. Crezco fosters an environment where emotional growth is prioritized, offering counseling services, mentorship programs, and support networks that nurture both personal and academic development. This equips students to break negative cycles related to emotional intelligence, addiction, and abuse.

subject_2.title: STUDENT SPONSORSHIP
subject_2.description: By supporting our program, you are directly contributing to the transformation of lives and the dismantling of negative cycles. Your investment in education sets in motion a chain reaction of progress, where each student's success ripples out to uplift their families, neighborhoods, and society as a whole.

Special_education.Abreviation-desktop: One size does not fit all when it comes to education, there are children within our sphere of influence who require specialized educational...
Special_education.Abreviation-mobile: One size does not fit all when it comes to education, there are children...
Special_education.Paragraph_1: At Crezco, we firmly believe that one size does not fit all when it comes to education. We recognize that there are children within our sphere of influence who require specialized educational resources to thrive.
Special_education.Paragraph_2: These resources are not always readily available or affordable, and we are dedicated to addressing this challenge head-on.

subject_1.title: SUPPORT SERVICES
subject_1.description: The Special Education Program is designed to provide targeted financial assistance to individuals with special educational needs, ensuring they receive equitable access to quality education and support services. These funds can be used to cover various expenses related to the developmental and behavioral needs of each student, including specialized learning materials, therapy sessions, and transportation.

subject_2.title: GROWTH FOR EVERY CHILD
subject_2.description: Our mission is to inspire and foster both academic and emotional growth for every child and student under our care, irrespective of their unique learning needs; and to empower students and their families, to achieve their full potential.

Community_support.Abreviation-desktop: Crezco seeks be a light in difficult world, finding ways to create more opportunities for growth in the surrounding community...
Community_support.Abreviation-mobile: Crezco seeks be a light in difficult world, finding ways to create more...
Community_support.Paragraph_1: Attending the needs of the local community allows Crezco to be a light in the world around us, extending our reach and creating more opportunities for growth. From weathering the aftermath of devastating natural disasters, to providing unwavering support during personal family tragedies, and offering specialized aid for educational challenges, our purpose is clear: to break negative cycles and inspire positive progress.

subject_1.title: COLLABORATION
subject_1.description: By addressing these unique situations head-on, we amplify our impact and cultivate an environment where growth and hope can flourish. An integral part of supporting our local community is a collaborative effort with local community members, working alongside them, listening to their needs. The aspiration to serve as a radiant force in the midst of adversity propels us forward, urging us to not only alleviate immediate burdens but also to create opportunity for long-lasting transformations through necessary preventative measures.

subject_2.title: COMMUNITY PROGRESS
subject_2.description: Through heartfelt compassion and a commitment to unity, we endeavor to cultivate a sense of resilience that extends beyond our community's boundaries. As we strive to be a beacon of hope, our efforts inspire positivity and progress that resonate far beyond our initial reach, contributing to the greater well-being of the world around us.

Student_mission.Abreviation-desktop: The purpose of this program is to foster a deep sense of service and selflessness as foundational principles in each student by...
Student_mission.Abreviation-mobile: The purpose of this program is to foster a deep sense of service and...
Student_mission.Paragraph_1: The Crezco Student Mission Trip Program is centered on fostering a deep sense of service and selflessness as foundational principles. Its core objective is to grant students the chance to make meaningful contributions to both local and global communities, all while acknowledging the generosity they themselves have received from others.

subject_1.title: SERVICE IN ACTION
subject_1.description: Through the Student Mission Trip program, Crezco aims to nurture Christian virtues within students by providing active platforms for them to embody these principles. By immersing themselves in unfamiliar environments, new experiences, and novel circumstances, students stand to undergo transformative growth as they dedicate their time and resources to aid families and communities in need. This opens them up to enriching experiences and personal development that is unmatched.

subject_2.title: YOUR SUPPORT
subject_2.description: The realization of this mission heavily relies on the support of dedicated donors and advocates such as yourself. Your contribution plays a pivotal role in turning this vision into a concrete reality, one that leaves a lasting impact on the lives of students and the communities they serve.

Medical_assistance.Abreviation: Crezco's Medical Assistance Program serves as a source of hope for families facing...
Medical_assistance.Paragraph_1: Crezco's Medical Assistance Program serves as a source of hope for families facing medical emergencies and crises within the local community. This program recognizes the significant economic strain these situations can impose on families with limited financial resources.

subject_1.title: BRIDGING THE GAP
subject_1.description: When individuals are unable to access necessary medical care, their health conditions can deteriorate rapidly, leading to more complex and severe medical issues. Crezco seeks to bridge this gap and enable individuals to receive the medical care they urgently require by providing families with the necessary support, resources, and financial assistance. This support may cover a portion or the entirety of medical expenses, including surgeries, medications, and rehabilitation. In addressing medical needs promptly, small health issues are prevented from escalating into larger, more complex problems.

subject_2.title: A STRONGER TOMORROW
subject_2.description: The ripple effect of providing medical assistance to families cannot be underestimated. When families receive the care they need, they can continue contributing to their community, pursuing their dreams, and building a brighter future for themselves and their children. This program recognizes that the well-being of a community is interlinked with the health and resilience of its individual members. Families are empowered to face challenges head-on, knowing that they have a partner in their journey towards health and recovery.

PAGE_CONTACT.Paragraph_1: Contact us to learn more about how you can get involved in a Crezco project!
PAGE_CONTACT.Contact_newsletter: I want to subscribe to the newsletter

SHARED_BANNER.Title: Crezco is successful because of your continuous support and collaboration.
SHARED_BANNER.Description: Crezco remains committed to its mission of transforming the lives of those it serves.

STORY_CREZCO.Paragraph_1: Crezco is an organization that originated from a small church ministry that began with a short-term mission trip in 1996 to a Christian children's home in Honduras.
STORY_CREZCO.Paragraph_2: Over the years, a strong relationship developed between the church and the children's home, leading to a realization that recent high school graduates from the home needed support to pursue higher education.
STORY_CREZCO.Subsection_2: Over time, a strong relationship developed between the church and the children's home, leading to the realization that recent high school graduates from the home needed support to pursue higher education.
STORY_CREZCO.Subsection_2-1: The goal was to equip students with the education and skills necessary to break the cycles of poverty, lack of education, unhealthy family patterns, mental health challenges, and the very circumstances that led them to the home. The ministry also aimed to instill in students a passion for serving others in Jesus.
STORY_CREZCO.Subsection_3: Funding for these efforts come from donors like you. Donations cover academic, medical, and personal expenses for each student. To date, 26 young people have benefited from the university program, with 15* successfully graduating from Christian universities throughout Latin America.
STORY_CREZCO.Subsection_3-1: Graduates have obtained degrees in diverse fields including computer systems engineering, culinary arts, physical therapy, nursing, clinical psychology, and graphic design. Each year new students from the children's home begin their university studies.
STORY_CREZCO.Subsection_5: As the ministry continued to expand, the decision was made to establish Crezco as a formal organization. In addition to the university program, Crezco's work also includes ongoing support for the local community.
STORY_CREZCO.Subsection_5-1: This support ranges from addressing emergency situations and providing medical care resources, to coordinating donations of clothing and educational supplies, organizing special celebrations, and disaster relief efforts.

Section_banner.Title: Dreams can Come True, Thanks to You
Section_banner.Description: Many young adults have been able ato graduate and achieve their goals of becoming professionals capable of contributing to their local communities.
